https://tmrev.io/movie/467482-A Man in a Hurry 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uzQHGId6xMUCtpz9UXykbue8SHU.jpg The story revolves around Alain, a busy businessman who is always in a rush. In his life, there is no room for spare time or family. But one day, he suffers a stroke, which makes him lose his grasp of language and use one word in place of another. A Man in a Hurry
